overview: Scotty, an unwilling Navy war hero is cast into the limelight. He wants to get married and be an engineer, but is forced to fulfil the expectations of the public, his employer and his PR agent, which he hates. Although he and his long time girlfriend Janet love each other, they are pressured to marry before they are ready.  The strain takes its toll on both of them.
tagline: He Was Too Busy Making History to Make Love!
title: It's Tough to Be Famous
